entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
